segments.text: I am confused . How could a golfer need so many clubs ? Seems to me , 14 altogether , right
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I should say , a a ' set ' of golf clubs is restricted to no more than 14 clubs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then what makes a ' set ' of clubs ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In general , a set of golf clubs 3 , 4 , 5 , 6 , 7 , 8 , 9 , PW ; Woods : 1 , 3 , 5 and a putter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is not to say you have to carry all of these clubs . It depends on your preferences .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you heard of Tiger Woods ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course even people who don't know anything about golf know his name .
segments.speaker: S2
